TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyItem extends System.Object

summary.span: 封装要包括到图像文件中的元数据属性。

span.span: Encapsulates a metadata property to be included in an image file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据包括：标识符、属性的长度 (（以字节为单位）) 属性、属性类型和指向属性值的指针。The data consists of: an identifier, the length (in bytes) of the property, the property type, and a pointer to the property value. 不应用作 独立的对象。A is not intended to be used as a stand-alone object. 对象旨在由派生自的类使用 。A object is intended to be used by classes that are derived from . 对象用于检索和更改现有图像文件的元数据，而不是创建元数据。A object is used to retrieve and to change the metadata of existing image files, not to create the metadata. 因此， 类没有定义的 `Public` 构造函数，并且不能创建对象的实例 。Therefore, the class does not have a defined `Public` constructor, and you cannot create an instance of a object. 若要解决缺少 `Public` 构造函数的情况，请使用现有 对象，而不是创建类的新实例 。To work around the absence of a `Public` constructor, use an existing object instead of creating a new instance of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类和属性来读取和显示图像文件中的元数据 。The following code example demonstrates how to read and display the metadata in an image file using the class and the property. 此示例设计为在导入命名空间的 Windows 窗体中使用 。This example is designed to be used in a Windows Form that imports the namespace. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并将路径更改为 `fakePhoto.jpg` ，以指向系统上的图像文件。Paste the code into the form and change the path to `fakePhoto.jpg` to point to an image file on your system. `ExtractMetaData`在处理窗体的事件时调用方法 ，并 `e` 以形式传递 。Call the `ExtractMetaData` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/VB/form1.vb#6)]

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of the property.

value.span: 一个整数，表示属性的 ID。

span.span: The integer that represents the ID of the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置 属性的长度（以字节为单位）。

value.span: 一个整数，表示 字节数组的长度（以字节为单位）。

span.span: An integer that represents the length (in bytes) of the byte array.

summary.span: 获取或设置整数，它定义 属性包含的数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets an integer that defines the type of data contained in the property.

value.span: 一个整数，定义 包含的数据类型。

span.span: An integer that defines the type of data contained in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了整数及其表示的类型。The following table shows integers and the types they represent. |IntegerInteger|表示类型Represented Type| |-------------|----------------------| |11|指定 是字节数组。Specifies that is an array of bytes.| |22|指定 为以 null 结尾的 ASCII 字符串。Specifies that is a null-terminated ASCII string. 如果将 type 数据成员设置为 ASCII 类型，则应将属性设置 为包含 null 终止符的字符串长度。If you set the type data member to ASCII type, you should set the property to the length of the string including the null terminator. 例如，字符串 "Hello" 的长度为6。For example, the string "Hello" would have a length of 6.| |33|指定 为无符号 short (16 位) 整数的数组。Specifies that is an array of unsigned short (16-bit) integers.| |44|指定 为无符号长 (32 位) 整数的数组。Specifies that is an array of unsigned long (32-bit) integers.| |55|指定 数据成员是无符号长整数对的数组。Specifies that data member is an array of pairs of unsigned long integers. 每一对都表示一个分数;第一个整数为分子，第二个整数为分母。Each pair represents a fraction; the first integer is the numerator and the second integer is the denominator.| |66|指定 为一个字节数组，该数组可以包含任何数据类型的值。Specifies that is an array of bytes that can hold values of any data type.| |77|指定 为有符号长 (32 位) 整数的数组。Specifies that is an array of signed long (32-bit) integers.| |1010|指定 为有符号长整数对的数组。Specifies that is an array of pairs of signed long integers. 每一对都表示一个分数;第一个整数为分子，第二个整数为分母。Each pair represents a fraction; the first integer is the numerator and the second integer is the denominator.| 有关属性标记的详细信息，请参阅 [图像属性标记常数](/windows/desktop/gdiplus/-gdiplus-constant-image-property-tag-constants)。For more information about property tags, see [Image Property Tag Constants](/windows/desktop/gdiplus/-gdiplus-constant-image-property-tag-constants).

summary.span: 获取或设置属性项的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the property item.

value.span: 一个字节数组，表示属性项的值。

span.span: A byte array that represents the value of the property item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的字节数组 包含若干不同基元类型之一中的数据。The byte array returned by the property contains data in one of several different primitive types. 若要使用数据，请使用属性确定数据类型 并相应地转换字节数组。To use the data, determine the data type using the property and convert the byte array accordingly.
